rooms.name: An oddly small room
rooms.description:
You are in a small room. There is a steel sword leaning against the wall.

There is a door to the north.
rooms.description2:
You are in a small room.

There is a door to the north.
instructions:
Great! now check your inventory.
There are various shortcuts available such as 'i', 'inv'
Now go north. You can type 'n', 'north' or 'go north' to move to the next room.

rooms.name: Large room
rooms.description: You are now in a large room with a wooden door to the east.
instructions: use describe to get a description of the room
A fierce beast is ahead, fight it!

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: You are now in a kitchen, there is a closed cabinet in the corner of the room.
instructions:
Great!, you can heal with various items around the map. 
Go south.

steel sword.description: A sharp steel sword. It looks like it can do some damage.

Fierce Beast.description: A fierce beast with sharp claws and teeth. It looks like it is ready to attack.

tutorial cabinet.description: A closed cabinet. It looks like it can be opened.

bread.description: A loaf of bread. It's moldy but it should be fine.
